badges.description:
Kick off Oakland Restaurant Week in style with the Industry Night Badge! Check in, share, save or add a tip for Dragon Gate during Industry Night on Monday, March 10, from 5:30 p.m. – 8:30 p.m. to earn this exclusive badge and secure your entry into a raffle for a $250 restaurant gift card.

Be sure to check back during Oakland Restaurant Week to earn each of the 6 limited edition badges.
badges.name: Industry Night at Dragon Gate

badges.description: Savor the best of The Town! This badge is your gateway to the most delicious spots in the city. Earn it by checking in to Oakland Restaurant Week restaurants and increase your chances of winning big!
badges.name: Taste of Oakland Badge

badges.description:
Indulge in world-class flavors! This badge celebrates Oakland’s Michelin-recognized restaurants, where culinary excellence shines. Earn it by checking in at award-winning spots during Oakland Restaurant Week.

This badge is available during Oakland Restaurant Week, March 20-30th.
badges.name: Hall of Fame Badge

badges.description:
Good food is best enjoyed together! Earn this badge by sharing your favorite spots with friends and family, or by saving places you plan to visit during Oakland Restaurant Week. Your crew will thank you later!

This badge is available during Oakland Restaurant Week, March 20-30th.
badges.name: The Host with the Most Badge

badges.description:
Your opinion matters! Share your thoughts, leave vibes, and drop tips about Oakland Restaurant Week spots. Earn this badge by spreading good vibes and foodie insights—who knows, your review might inspire someone’s next favorite meal!

This badge is available during Oakland Restaurant Week, March 20-30th.
badges.name: Tastemaker Badge

badges.description:
Dine with purpose. This badge, hosted by Community Kitchen’s Dining for Justice program, highlights restaurants that give back to Oakland. Earn it by checking in at participating spots that help feed and uplift the community.

This badge is available during Oakland Restaurant Week, Marc 20-30th.
badges.name: Justice Served Badge

badges.description:
Be the first to discover Oakland’s newest culinary gems! These spots are making their Oakland Restaurant Week debut, and your check-in earns you this badge—plus bragging rights as an early adopter of deliciousness.

This badge is available during Oakland Restaurant Week, March 20-30th.
badges.name: Fresh Find Badge

badges.description: Welcome to Downtown San Francisco, where the city’s heartbeat is strongest and every street has a story to tell. From iconic landmarks and legendary eateries to stylish bars and hidden gems, this neighborhood is packed with places to explore.  Find your vibe, discover new favorites, and dive into the best of Downtown San Francisco.
badges.name: Downtown San Francisco Badge - San Francisco Vibes

badges.description: Welcome to The East Cut, a vibrant San Francisco neighborhood where there’s always something to discover. From buzzing bars and top-notch restaurants to peaceful green spaces and scenic walkways, this district is the perfect mix of city energy and laid-back charm. Find your vibe, check out great spots, and experience The East Cut in style.
badges.name: East Cut Badge - San Francisco Vibes

badges.description: It’s time to eat your way through Downtown Evanston—and get rewarded for it! Whether you’re after a quick bite, a go-to coffee shop, an upscale dinner, or something sweet, there’s a spot for every craving and every vibe. Hit the best restaurants, explore new flavors, and claim your title as THE Downtown Evanston foodie. 😋🏆
badges.name: Downtown Evanston Let's Eat Badge

badges.description: You’re the friend who always knows the place—now it’s time to prove it. From laid-back brunch spots to cozy corners perfect for long hangs, Downtown Evanston is packed with places to vibe, sip, and savor. Whether it’s mimosas with friends, a hidden gem café, or a go-to weekend hangout, this badge is your excuse to explore them all.
badges.name: I Know a Spot Badge

badges.description: Who says dining out has to break the bank? Downtown Evanston is packed with wallet-friendly gems serving up delicious bites, from grab-and-go favorites to cozy spots with unbeatable lunch deals. Whether you’re looking for a quick, tasty meal or a budget-friendly feast, this badge is proof that great food and great prices go hand in hand.
badges.name: Good Times, Great Budget Badge

badges.description: Sweet cravings? Consider them satisfied. Downtown Evanston is filled with spots serving up pure dessert happiness—whether it’s a warm, gooey pastry, a scoop of dreamy gelato, or a slice of cake that’s almost too pretty to eat (almost). Every bite is a little moment of bliss, and this badge is your excuse to enjoy them all.
badges.name: Sugar & Bliss Badge

badges.description: Elevated flavors, impeccable vibes, and dining done right—this badge is for those who appreciate the finer things. From elegant multi-course meals to refined spots perfect for a special night out, Downtown Evanston’s fine dining scene is ready to impress. Dress up, sip something smooth, and take your seat at The Grand Table.
badges.name: The Grand Table Badge

badges.description: Take your taste buds on a trip—no passport needed! Downtown Evanston is a global feast, serving up flavors from every corner of the world. Whether you’re craving spicy, savory, sweet, or something totally new, this badge is your ticket to the best international eats in town. Ready to explore one bite at a time?
badges.name: Flavors Without Borders Badge

badges.description: For the coffee lovers, tea sippers, boba fanatics, and mocktail enthusiasts—this one’s for you. Downtown Evanston is full of cozy cafés, chill tea spots, and perfect nooks to sip, savor, and settle in with your laptop. Whether you’re here to caffeinate, study, or just enjoy a slow sip, this badge is your invitation to find your new favorite go-to.
badges.name: Sip and Savor Badge

badges.description: Check in at as many stations as you can, and score amazing prizes along the way! Show the Bay Area that you’re a true Stations Navigator and a public transit pro—explore, connect, and make your mark across the city!
badges.name: BART Station Navigator

badges.description: Enjoy the Bay Area views from above! Riding at elevated stations gives you the perfect moment to take in the stunning vistas and savor your commute with the best vibes. Check in at each elevated station, and don’t forget to upload your photos to share the amazing views. Each check-in earns you points towards exclusive BARTable merch.
badges.name: Riding High Bartable Badge

badges.description: Certainly, going below the surface is a unique vibe! Embrace the mole style, meditate your commute, and check in at all the underground stations to earn this badge. Capture your journey with photos, share your tips, and check in regularly for special prizes.
badges.name: Lowrider Bartable Badge

badges.description: Looks like you’re loyal to the Green Line! Check in at any station along this line to earn your Loyal to the Line badge and score some exclusive merch. Show off your knowledge and enjoy the rewards!
badges.name: Loyal to the Line: Green Line Badge

badges.description: Looks like you’re loyal to the Yellow Line! Check in at any station along this line to earn your Loyal to the Line badge and score some exclusive merch. Show off your knowledge and enjoy the rewards!
badges.name: Loyal to the Line: Yellow Line Badge

badges.description: Looks like you’re loyal to the Red Line! Check in at any station along this line to earn your Loyal to the Line badge and score some exclusive merch. Show off your knowledge and enjoy the rewards!
badges.name: Loyal to the Line: Red Line Badge

badges.description: Looks like you’re loyal to the Blue Line! Check in at any station along this line to earn your Loyal to the Line badge and score some exclusive merch. Show off your knowledge and enjoy the rewards!
badges.name: Loyal to the Line: Blue Line Badge

badges.description:
Surreal and quirky, you embrace the unexpected. From The American Bookbinders Museum to Novela, check in at these delightful spots to earn your Dreamweaver Badge and enjoy the magic of the unusual!

This challenge is part of the San Francisco Vibes Challenge: Yerba Buena Edition—where the whimsical and extraordinary come to life. Step into a world of wonder, embrace the unexpected, and let Yerba Buena fuel your imagination!
badges.name: The Dreamweaver - San Francisco Vibes Yerba Buena Edition

badges.description:
You seek peace and reflection. From Berggruen Gallery’s calm to The Garden Court’s serenity, check in at these peaceful spots to earn your Zen Seeker Badge and find your inner calm.

This challenge is part of the San Francisco Vibes Challenge: Yerba Buena Edition—a journey through the district’s most tranquil and restorative spaces. Embrace the stillness, soak in the serenity, and let Yerba Buena be your oasis of calm.
badges.name: The Zen Seeker - San Francisco Vibes Yerba Buena Edition

badges.description:
Energetic and vibrant, you light up every space you enter. From the lively Buena Vida Cantina to Yerba Buena Bowling Center, check in at these spots to claim your Firecracker Badge and keep the energy high!

This challenge is part of the San Francisco Vibes Challenge: Yerba Buena Edition—where fun, excitement, and high-energy vibes take center stage. Dive into the buzz of Yerba Buena and let your dynamic spirit shine!
badges.name: The Firecracker - San Francisco Vibes Yerba Buena Edition

badges.description:
Sustainability is your way of life. Whether enjoying eco-friendly dining at Oren’s Hummus or relaxing at Yerba Buena Gardens, check in at these spots to earn your Earthkeeper Badge and honor your connection to nature!

This challenge is part of the San Francisco Vibes Challenge: Yerba Buena Edition—celebrating green spaces, mindful living, and sustainable choices. Embrace the eco-conscious spirit of Yerba Buena and leave a positive impact on the city!
badges.name: The Earthkeeper Badge - San Francisco Vibes Yerba Buena Edition

badges.description:
Always ahead of the curve, you embrace future-forward experiences. From immersive tech at the Children’s Creativity Museum to sleek vibes at Salesforce Transit Center, check in at these spots to claim your badge and step into the future!

This challenge is part of the San Francisco Vibes Challenge: Yerba Buena Edition—where cutting-edge innovation meets urban energy. Discover the forward-thinking spirit of Yerba Buena and make your mark on the city’s dynamic landscape!
badges.name: The Futurist Badge - San Francisco Vibes Yerba Buena Edition

badges.description: Explore the best of Downtown Oakland with Oakland Works Wednesday! Start your day with coffee, enjoy local eats for lunch, and wind down with happy hour vibes. Shop, dine, and vibe to live music and special programming as we celebrate our community. Check in at participating places, earn points, and win exciting prizes. Let’s make Wednesdays shine together!
badges.name: Oakland Works Wednesday Badge

badges.description:
Bold and boundary-pushing, you thrive where creativity meets innovation. From SFMOMA to 111 Minna Gallery, explore art that challenges the norm. Check in at these spots to claim your badge and celebrate your visionary spirit!

This challenge is part of the San Francisco Vibes Challenge: Yerba Buena Edition—a journey through the district’s most inspiring spaces. Immerse yourself in the art, culture, and energy that make Yerba Buena a hub for visionaries like you!
badges.name: The Visionary - San Francisco Vibes Yerba Buena Edition

badges.description: Everyone has a favorite station, and now every visit helps you become a Station Master! Check in at your go-to stop—or any station you visit—to earn points toward amazing BARTable prizes. Each visit brings new opportunities to celebrate your adventures and enjoy your transit experience

badges.description: Get ready to show your love for Harlem! Join the #HarlemNeatStreets Challenge and team up with fellow community members to make a difference. Together, we’ll clean up, beautify, and celebrate our amazing neighborhood.
badges.name: Neat Streets Challenge

badges.description: Join us for the SOMA West Coffee Passport and dive into a flavorful adventure! Explore the vibrant SOMA West neighborhood while discovering cozy coffee spots and unique vibes. Use Vibemap to guide your adventure and support local businesses along the way. Don’t miss this exciting opportunity to savor the best of SOMA West!
badges.name: SOMA West Coffee Passport

badges.description: Wander through the Village to discover exclusive sales, tasty treats, live music, creative demonstrations, and family-friendly activities. Don’t miss your chance to meet Jolly St. Nick and Mrs. Claus while collecting special prizes along the way. Embrace the magic of the season, explore local shops, and unlock rewards as you celebrate the holidays in true La Jolla fashion!
badges.name: Holiday Open House Badge

Check in at your go-to stop—or any station you visit—to earn points toward amazing BARTable prizes. Each visit brings new opportunities to celebrate your adventures and enjoy your transit experience

badges.name: 12th St. Oakland: Station Master

badges.description:
Embark on a flavor-packed, boozy adventure through San Diego’s vibrant Gaslamp Quarter with our exclusive Craft Cocktail Crawl. Your ticket to tantalizing tastes and unforgettable experiences awaits! Gather your friends, family, or colleagues and explore at your own pace as you sip your way through unique, handcrafted cocktails at top-notch venues with special discounts along the way.

Need help? Email us at gaslampquarter@vibemap.com
badges.name: Gaslamp Craft Cocktail Crawl

badges.description: Dive into La Jolla Village’s fall charm with the La Jolla Village Fall Vibes adventure! Discover iconic coffee shops, vibrant art and wine scenes, and top beauty and fitness spots, all while enjoying stress-free parking. Explore, indulge, and earn amazing prizes as you experience the best of La Jolla Village this fall.
badges.name: La Jolla Village Fall Vibes

badges.description: Rejuvenate and energize as you explore the top beauty and fitness spots in La Jolla Village. Earn rewards while indulging in the ultimate wellness and self-care experiences, all in the heart of the Village.
badges.name: Village Vitality Badge

badges.description: Explore, admire, and earn rewards as you visit the captivating art galleries around La Jolla. Immerse yourself in the creative spirit of the Village this fall and unlock amazing prizes as you experience the best of La Jolla’s artistic treasures.
badges.name: Art in the Village Badge

badges.description: Sip, savor, and earn rewards as you indulge in the best coffee and brunch spots around La Jolla. Explore, indulge, and earn amazing prizes as you experience the best of La Jolla Village this fall.
badges.name: La Jolla Brunch & Brew Badge

badges.description: Explore Downtown Seattle, Find Vibes and Win Prizes.
badges.name: Downtown Seattle Challenge

badges.description:
Explore downtown Peoria, discover amazing places, and earn this badge by checking in, sharing locations, saving them, or adding vibes.

Win cool prizes and become a Downtown Peoria expert as you find new vibes
badges.name: Downtown Peoria

badges.description:
Starting at Riverside Common Park, the former site of Toronto’s first Baseball Grounds and current site of a public park and year-round exciting events and activities, this walk will journey to iconic landmarks in Riverside’s 10 blocks along Queen Street East.

From the infamous metal art atop the Queen St Viaduct, to historic buildings like The Broadview Hotel, this walk will have you exploring and honing your photography skills!
badges.name: Riverside Photo Walk

badges.description: On June 20th from 6pm to 10pm, embark on a captivating journey. Explore the best vintage spots on Riverside and unlock the area’s hidden gems with the Vintage Crawl Challenge! Discover places like the Arts Market, the Queen Garden Centre Pop Up!, the Common Sort Store, and more, collecting points as you delve into the hidden gems of  this historic neighbourhood. Explore each spot’s unique story for a chance to win local prizes.
badges.name: Vintage Crawl

badges.description: Join us for the SOMA West Summer Quest Vibemap Challenge and make your summer memorable! From May 27th through August 2024, explore the vibrant SOMA West neighborhood and discover amazing places brimming with unique vibes. Use Vibemap to guide your adventure and support local businesses along the way. Don’t miss out on this exciting opportunity to experience the best of SOMA West!
badges.name: SOMA West Summer Quest

badges.description: Explore places like Riverside Common and The Broadview Hotel, earn points, and uncover the area’s history. Each location offers a unique story and a chance to win prizes.
badges.name: Riverside Roots

badges.description: Explore Downtown Memphis and Win Prizes.
badges.name: Downtown Memphis Challenge

badges.description: Embark on an exhilarating journey with the Oakland Summer Vibes Badge, exploring the diverse cultural heritage of Oakland. From the captivating exhibits at the Oakland Museum to the lively ambiance of Roots Stadium, uncover exclusive rewards and unforgettable experiences at every turn.
badges.name: Oakland Summer Vibes

badges.description: Unleash your inner child and discover the magic of Fairyland with the enchanting Fairyland Badge. Engage with the magic of Fairyland to unlock exclusive rewards, from souvenir trinkets to VIP experiences.
badges.name: Children’s Fairyland

badges.description: Prepare to be awestruck by the wonders of the cosmos with the Chabot Space & Science Center Badge. Engage with the mysteries of the universe to unlock exclusive rewards, from celestial plushies to family memberships.
badges.name: Chabot Space & Science Center

badges.description: Step into a world of wonder with the Oakland Zoo Badge, where every corner holds a new adventure waiting to be explored. Engage with the exhibits and activities to unlock exclusive rewards, from behind-the-scenes animal encounters to collector’s items.
badges.name: Oakland Zoo

badges.description: Embark on a journey of discovery with the Oakland Roots and Soul Sports Club Badge, where the pulse of the city beats strongest. Dive into the passion of sports culture, earning the chance to win exclusive tickets and merchandise along the way.
badges.name: Oakland Roots and Soul Sports Club

badges.description: Explore the wonders of the Oakland Museum of California, from the Special Exhibition Great Hall to the vibrant Gallery of California Art and History. Don’t miss out on the lively atmosphere of Friday Nights and the delicious offerings at Town Fare cafe.
badges.name: Oakland Museum of California

badges.description: GSB (Girl Sustainability Band) is thrilled to collaborate with Vibemap, to bring you our unique Digital Passport! Designed to guide you through a curated selection of unforgettable local experiences, this passport is your key to exploring hidden gems and cultural treasures. Whether you’re an art enthusiast eager to discover local artists, or an adventurer looking to connect with nature, our Digital Passport offers personalized pathways to truly immersive experiences. Get ready to transform the way you travel and create vibes that last a lifetime!
badges.name: Unlock the Heart of the City: GSB’s exclusive Digital Passport!

badges.description:
Ignite your sense of adventure with our Play all Day Badge, guiding you to local parks, captivating museums, and exciting attractions just a stone’s throw from BART stations. From serene green spaces to cultural hotspots, embark on a journey of exploration and entertainment, transforming your commute into a thrilling adventure at every stop.

This badge is part of BARTable’s Transit Treasures: Spring Expedition limited edition badges.

Not seeing a place you’d expect? Email us at info@vibemap.com and we’ll get it added to this badge.
badges.name: Play all Day Badge

badges.description:
Unlock a world of culinary delights with our Foodie Frenzy Badge, guiding you to tantalizing food and drink options just a hop, skip, and a BART ride away. Elevate your commute with every bite and sip, transforming your journey into a delicious adventure.

This badge is part of BARTable’s Transit Treasures: Spring Expedition limited edition badges.

Not seeing a place you’d expect? Email us at info@vibemap.com and we’ll get it added to this badge.
badges.name: Foodie Frenzy Badge

badges.description: Discover the most delectable restaurants in Oakland through the Oakland Restaurant Week Badge, hosted by Visit Oakland. From March 14 – 24, indulge in exclusive restaurant week specials, menus, and culinary surprises. Earn this badge by checking in to Oakland Restaurant Week participating places to be in the running for great prizes.
badges.name: Oakland Restaurant Week Badge

badges.description: Eat local; give local with this badge, hosted by Community Kitchen’s Dining For Justice program. Discover Oakland Restaurant Week spots that support their community by helping feed Oakland. Earn this badge by checking in to Dining for Justice spots participating in Oakland Restaurant Week. This badge is available during Oakland Restaurant Week, March 14-24.
badges.name: Dining for Justice Badge

badges.description: Celebrate the accomplishments of Oakland’s award-winning restaurants participating in Oakland Restaurant Week. Each of these places have earned Michelin awards for their culinary prowess. Earn this badge by checking in to award-winning spots participating in Oakland Restaurant Week. This badge is available during Oakland Restaurant Week, March 14-24.
badges.name: Award-Winning Badge

badges.description:
Hot off the presses! These spots are new to Oakland Restaurant Week this year and worth a try! Earn this badge by checking in to new spots particpating in Oakland Restaurant Week.

This badge is available during Oakland Restaurant Week, March 14-24.
badges.name: Fresh Flavors Badge

badges.description:
Let us know what you love about Oakland Restaurant Week spots! Earn this badge by leaving vibes or tips about participating places. Remember, good vibes only!

This badge is available during Oakland Restaurant Week, March 14-24.
badges.name: Food Critic Badge

badges.description:
Bring friends and family together this Oakland Restaurant week with the Social Coordinator Badge. Earn this badge by sharing places with friends and family and saving places you plan on visiting.

This badge is available during Oakland Restaurant Week, March 14-24.
badges.name: Social Coordinator Badge

badges.description: Explore Downtown San Diego and Win Prizes.

map.address: The Westgate Hotel, 2nd Avenue, San Diego, CA, USA
map.name: The Westgate Hotel

badges.name: San Diego Downtown Challenge

map.name: Lake Merritt

badges.description: Unlock prizes and embrace local adventures while you explore the Downtown Berkeley BART Station.
